content.text: Hey, I'm a single mom working two jobs to support my children. What about you?
Hello! I just moved to LA from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I'm making them lunch to show my appreciation. How are you doing today?
That's really nice of you! I'm a writer, and I'm working on a new book. It's a lot of work, but I'm excited about it.
That's great! I love to read. I need to find a way to balance my love of binge watching with my need to focus on my art.
I love to work out with music. It helps me push myself. What are your hobbies?
I love to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs. I also love to go for walks with my dog.
I have a dog too! He's a great source of stress relief.
That's great! My dog is my best friend.
I'm really glad I met you. We should hang out sometime.
Yeah, that would be great! I'm free this weekend.
